price: (Nkͻmhyεni), Yεde wͻn asεm no mu nokorε na εrebͻ wo amaneε. Nokorε sε, wͻyε mmranteε a wͻgyee wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn diiε, na Yεde tenenee kaa wͻn ho.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ نَبَأَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّهُمۡ فِتۡيَةٌ ءَامَنُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ وَزِدۡنَٰهُمۡ هُدٗى

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka naba-ahum bil-ḥaqi innahum fit'yatun āmanū birabbihim wazid'nāhum hudan
